title: PM-KISAN Samman Nidhi
description: Financial assistance to small and marginal farmers for agriculture and allied activities
eligibility: Small and marginal farmers with cultivable land
benefits: ₹6,000 per year in three installments
howToApply: Apply online through PM-KISAN portal or visit nearest Common Service Center

title: Ayushman Bharat - Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana
description: World's largest health insurance scheme providing coverage up to ₹5 lakh per family
eligibility: Families identified through Socio-Economic Caste Census (SECC)
benefits: Health insurance coverage up to ₹5 lakh per family per year
howToApply: Check eligibility and apply through nearest hospital or Common Service Center

title: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (Urban)
description: Housing for All mission providing affordable housing solutions in urban areas
eligibility: Economically Weaker Section (EWS), Lower Income Group (LIG), and Middle Income Group (MIG)
benefits: Subsidy on home loans and direct financial assistance
howToApply: Apply through official PMAY-U portal or visit nearest bank

title: Pradhan Mantri MUDRA Yojana
description: Micro financing scheme for small businesses and entrepreneurs
eligibility: Non-corporate, non-farm small/micro enterprises
benefits: Collateral-free loans up to ₹10 lakh
howToApply: Apply through banks, NBFCs, or MFIs

title: Swachh Bharat Mission
description: Clean India initiative promoting sanitation and hygiene
eligibility: All households without access to toilets
benefits: Financial assistance for construction of individual household latrines
howToApply: Apply through local Panchayat or municipal corporation

title: National Scholarship Portal
description: Scholarships for students from various categories and backgrounds
eligibility: Students from SC/ST/OBC/Minority communities and economically weaker sections
benefits: Monthly scholarships and one-time grants
howToApply: Apply online through National Scholarship Portal

title: Pradhan Mantri Shram Yogi Maan-Dhan
description: Pension scheme for unorganized sector workers
eligibility: Unorganized workers aged 18-40 years with monthly income up to ₹15,000
benefits: Monthly pension of ₹3,000 after 60 years of age
howToApply: Apply through Common Service Centers or online portal

title: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana
description: LPG connections to women from BPL households
eligibility: Women from BPL households
benefits: Free LPG connection and financial assistance
howToApply: Apply through LPG distributors or online

title: Digital India Initiative
description: Digital transformation of India through technology
eligibility: All citizens and businesses
benefits: Digital services, online governance, and digital literacy
howToApply: Various online portals and digital service centers

title: Startup India
description: Initiative to promote startup ecosystem in India
eligibility: Startups and entrepreneurs
benefits: Tax exemptions, funding support, and regulatory support
howToApply: Register on Startup India portal

title: Jal Jeevan Mission
description: Providing safe and adequate drinking water through individual household tap connections by 2024
eligibility: Rural households without piped water supply
benefits: Tap water connection to every rural household
howToApply: Apply through local gram panchayat or district collector office

title: Pradhan Mantri MUDRA Yojana
description: Providing loans up to ₹10 lakh to non-corporate, non-farm small/micro enterprises
eligibility: Small businesses, vendors, artisans, and service providers
benefits: Collateral-free loans from ₹50,000 to ₹10 lakh
howToApply: Apply through banks, NBFCs, and MFIs

title: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana
description: Providing LPG connections to women from Below Poverty Line households
eligibility: Women from BPL families, SC/ST households, and other priority categories
benefits: Free LPG connection with financial assistance for refills
howToApply: Apply through LPG distributors or online portal

title: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana - Urban
description: Affordable housing for urban poor under Housing for All mission
eligibility: EWS, LIG, and MIG categories in urban areas
benefits: Interest subsidy, affordable housing units, and infrastructure development
howToApply: Apply through Common Service Centers or online portal

title: Skill India Mission
description: Skill development and entrepreneurship training for youth
eligibility: Youth aged 15-35 years seeking skill development
benefits: Free skill training, certification, and placement assistance
howToApply: Register on Skill India portal or visit training centers

title: Kisan Credit Card Scheme
description: Providing adequate and timely credit support for agriculture and allied activities
eligibility: All farmers including tenant farmers, oral lessees, and sharecroppers
benefits: Flexible credit limit, low interest rates, and insurance coverage
howToApply: Apply through banks and cooperative societies

title: Swachh Bharat Mission
description: Clean India Mission for sanitation coverage and waste management
eligibility: All rural and urban households
benefits: Toilet construction incentive, waste management infrastructure
howToApply: Apply through local authorities or online portal

title: Beti Bachao Beti Padhao
description: Save and educate the girl child campaign
eligibility: Girl children and their families
benefits: Educational support, awareness campaigns, and safety measures
howToApply: Apply through schools and district administration

title: Digital India Programme
description: Transforming India into digitally empowered society and knowledge economy
eligibility: All citizens, government departments, and service providers
benefits: Digital infrastructure, digital literacy, and e-governance services
howToApply: Participate through various digital initiatives and programs

title: Pradhan Mantri Bharatiya Janaushadhi Pariyojana
description: Providing quality medicines at affordable prices through Jan Aushadhi stores
eligibility: All citizens requiring affordable medicines
benefits: Quality generic medicines at 50-90% lower prices
howToApply: Purchase from Jan Aushadhi stores across the country

title: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana
description: Crop insurance scheme providing financial support to farmers suffering crop loss
eligibility: All farmers growing notified crops in notified areas
benefits: Insurance coverage for crop losses due to natural calamities
howToApply: Apply through banks, CSCs, and insurance companies

title: Pradhan Mantri Shram Yogi Maan-dhan
description: Pension scheme for unorganized workers ensuring old age protection
eligibility: Unorganized workers aged 18-40 years with monthly income up to ₹15,000
benefits: Guaranteed pension of ₹3,000 per month after 60 years
howToApply: Apply through CSCs or online portal

title: Post Matric Scholarship for SC/ST Students
description: Financial assistance for SC/ST students pursuing higher education
eligibility: SC/ST students studying in classes XI-XII and higher education
benefits: Tuition fees, maintenance allowance, and other compulsory fees
howToApply: Apply through National Scholarship Portal

title: Rooftop Solar Programme
description: Installing solar power systems on rooftops to generate clean energy
eligibility: Residential, commercial, and institutional consumers
benefits: Subsidy on solar installation and net metering facility
howToApply: Apply through state electricity boards or approved vendors

title: Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act
description: Providing 100 days of guaranteed wage employment to rural households
eligibility: Rural households willing to do unskilled manual work
benefits: Guaranteed employment for 100 days with minimum wages
howToApply: Apply for job card at local Gram Panchayat

title: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana
description: Small savings scheme for girl child's education and marriage expenses
eligibility: Girl child below 10 years of age
benefits: Tax-free returns, competitive interest rates, and tax deduction
howToApply: Open account at post office or authorized banks

title: PPE Kits for Healthcare Workers
description: Providing personal protective equipment to healthcare workers
eligibility: Healthcare workers in government and private hospitals
benefits: Free PPE kits including masks, gloves, and protective suits
howToApply: Apply through hospital administration or health department

title: Stand Up India Scheme
description: Bank loans for SC/ST and women entrepreneurs for greenfield enterprises
eligibility: SC/ST and women entrepreneurs aged 18 years and above
benefits: Bank loans between ₹10 lakh to ₹1 crore with handholding support
howToApply: Apply through scheduled commercial banks
